fields.name: request_delete_email
fields.description: Email that gets sent when a request is deleted .
fields.subject: Deleted request #{{id}}
fields.content: Confirmation that {{first_name}} {{last_name}} deleted a request on role {{category_type}}:{{title}} at {{start_time}} - {{end_time}}

fields.name: request_update_email
fields.description: Email for informing volunteers of request updates.
fields.subject: Updated request for {{title}}
fields.content:
Hi {{first_name}} {{last_name}}!

Your volunteer request for {{title}} at {{start_time}} - {{end_time}} has been updated.

STATUS: {{status}}

Go check out your user profile to see more!

Thanks,

UFest Edmonton

fields.name: request_create_email
fields.description: Email sent when volunteers create a volunteer request
fields.subject: Confirmation of Volunteer Request on {{title}}
fields.content:
Hi {{first_name}} {{last_name}}!

Your volunteer request for {{title}} at {{start_time}} - {{end_time}} has been created.

STATUS: {{status}}

Go check out your user profile to see more!

Thanks,

UFest Edmonton
